verses.roman:
tāte ihāṅ rahile mora nā haya 'kalyāṇa'
ājñā deha'--ratha dekhi' yāṅa vṛndāvana

synonyms: tāte—because of this; ihāṅ—here; rahile—if I remain; mora—my; nā—not; haya—there is; kalyāṇa—auspiciousness; ājñā deha'-kindly give the order; ratha dekhi'-after witnessing the Ratha-yātrā festival; yāṅa vṛndāvana—I may return to Vṛndāvana.
translation: "Therefore I see that I will get nothing auspicious by staying here. Kindly give me orders allowing me to return to Vṛndāvana after the Ratha-yātrā festival.
